channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RFK Jr. Suspends Presidential Campaign, Endorses Trump
item.description: "I am not terminating my campaign, I am simply suspending it,” said Robert F. Kennedy Jr., before he endorsed Donald Trump.

item.title: ‘Disappointed but not surprised’: Former employees speak on OpenAI’s opposition to SB 1047
item.description: Two former OpenAI researchers who resigned this year over safety concerns say they are disappointed but not surprised by OpenAI’s decision to oppose C...

item.title: Chanel’s New Celeb-Endorsed Audio Jewelry Is Powered by Master & Dynamic
item.description: The uber-luxe Première Sound Watch is here to join the cheapo wired buds revolution, despite being the very opposite.

item.title: VC Neil Mehta, who’s quietly nabbing prized SF property, plans a “Y Combinator for restaurants”
item.description: Neil Mehta, the VC behind the acquisition of a string of properties on San Francisco’s tony Fillmore Street, made waves earlier this week for reported...

item.title: Online Action Movie Fandom Birthed a New Film-Fest Era
item.description: The Big Bad Film Fest, now in its second year, is like a big, muscle-bound hug for Very Online action-movie obsessives who brought it to life.

item.title: Justice Department sues RealPage over allegedly helping landlords collude to drive up rents
item.description: RealPage, which makes property management software, was sued Friday by the U.S. Justice Department and eight attorneys general for allegedly helping a...

item.title: 7 Best MagSafe Power Banks for iPhones (2024): High Capacity, Slim, Kickstands
item.description: Keep your iPhone topped up with one of these WIRED-tested MagSafe portable chargers.

item.title: Colorful Capital will stop trying to raise for a fund
item.description: Colorful Capital’s co-founders, William Burckart and Megan Kashner, declined to comment. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only...

item.title: The Apartment Rental Market Is Rigged by Algorithms, a DOJ Lawsuit Alleges
item.description: The US Department of Justice claims that a company called RealPage is responsible for price-fixing across millions of apartment rental units nationwid...

item.title: Andrew Ng steps back at Landing AI after announcing new fund
item.description: Andrew Ng is stepping down from his role as CEO at Landing AI, the computer vision platform he founded in 2017. Dan Maloney, formerly the COO, will ta...
